author: lightclient
content: Is there a script for programmatically submitting thousands of new testnet validators? Launch pad needs each individual tx signed, would rather send the funds to a tmp address and load that mnemonic and deposit data into a script

author: jgm
content: You could script something with `ethdo` and `ethereal`

author: parithosh
content: Yea exactly, Goerli + Sepolia will be around long term. Goerli/Prater is open for everyone, Sepolia will have a really small validator set to ensure good functioning.
